VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Industries relative to Crimson Group?
SRP.A: Nova Industries is {above} Crimson Group in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Oracle Systems relative to Nova Industries?
SRP.A: Oracle Systems is {below} Nova Industries in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Oracle Systems relative to Crimson Group?
SRP.A: Oracle Systems is {above} Crimson Group in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Nova Industries}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Oracle Systems}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Oracle Systems's minimum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Oracle Systems's minimum Patent Applications is in {2019}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Nova Industries's maximum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Nova Industries's maximum Patent Applications is in {2021}.

NC.Q: Was the total Patent Applications in 2009 higher or lower than in 2014?
NC.A: The total patent applications in 2009 was {lower} than in 2014.

NC.Q: Between 2013 and 2016, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1999 and 2002?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 2013 and 2016 was {higher} than between 1999 and 2002.

NC.Q: Was the total Patent Applications in 2008 higher or lower than in 2019?
NC.A: The total patent applications in 2008 was {lower} than in 2019.

NC.Q: Between 2008 and 2014, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1999 and 2005?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 2008 and 2014 was {higher} than between 1999 and 2005.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Nova Industries} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Crimson Group and Oracle Systems first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Crimson Group and Oracle Systems first exchanged leading positions in {2000}.
